name: autobrr
description: Autobrr is an automated tool that monitors torrent trackers and pushes downloads to clients like qBittorrent and Deluge. It filters releases in real-time and supports Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr automation.

features.title: Tracker Monitoring
features.description: Automatically monitor torrent trackers for new releases. Real-time detection

features.title: Auto
features.description: Push torrents to qBittorrent, Deluge, and more. Automated workflow

features.title: Release Filtering
features.description: Filter by quality, size, and custom rules. Precise control

features.title: *arr Integration
features.description: Works with Radarr, Sonarr, and Lidarr. Complete automation

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Instant notification and download of new releases. Lightning fast

features.title: Multi
features.description: Support for numerous private and public trackers. Comprehensive coverage

features.title: Cross
features.description: Available for Linux, Windows, macOS, and Android. Universal access

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own automation server. Complete control
